tasks.label: Monitor Ollama Status
args: while($true) { try { $response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri 'http://localhost:11434/api/tags' -Method GET -TimeoutSec 5; Write-Host "[$(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')] Ollama Status: OK - Models: $($response.models.Count)" -ForegroundColor Green } catch { Write-Host "[$(Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss')] Ollama Status: OFFLINE" -ForegroundColor Red }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 30 }

tasks.label: ðŸ“Š Service Status - Check All Services
args: Write-Host 'ðŸ“Š Checking Legal AI Platform Service Status...' -ForegroundColor White; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'ðŸ”§ PostgreSQL 17:' -ForegroundColor Green -NoNewline; try { & 'C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\pg_ctl.exe' status -D 'C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\data' | Out-Null; Write-Host ' âœ… RUNNING' -ForegroundColor Cyan } catch { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host 'ðŸ”´ Redis (4005):' -ForegroundColor Red -NoNewline; try { $redis = Test-NetConnection -ComputerName localhost -Port 4005 -WarningAction SilentlyContinue; if ($redis.TcpTestSucceeded) { Write-Host ' âœ… RUNNING' -ForegroundColor Cyan } else { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red } } catch { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host 'ðŸ—„ï¸ MinIO (4002):' -ForegroundColor Magenta -NoNewline; try { $minio = Test-NetConnection -ComputerName localhost -Port 4002 -WarningAction SilentlyContinue; if ($minio.TcpTestSucceeded) { Write-Host ' âœ… RUNNING' -ForegroundColor Cyan } else { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red } } catch { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host 'âš¡ SvelteKit Dev:' -ForegroundColor Blue -NoNewline; try { $svelte = Test-NetConnection -ComputerName localhost -Port 5173 -WarningAction SilentlyContinue; if ($svelte.TcpTestSucceeded) { Write-Host ' âœ… RUNNING' -ForegroundColor Cyan } else { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red } } catch { Write-Host ' âŒ OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'ðŸŽ¯ Legal AI Platform Status Complete' -ForegroundColor White
tasks.detail: Check status of all Legal AI Platform services

tasks.label: ðŸ›‘ Stop All Services - Graceful Shutdown
args: Write-Host 'ðŸ›‘ Stopping all Legal AI Platform services...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'ðŸ”§ Stopping PostgreSQL...' -ForegroundColor Green; try { $env:PGPASSWORD='123456'; & 'C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\pg_ctl.exe' stop -D 'C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\data' -m fast } catch { Write-Host 'PostgreSQL stop failed' -ForegroundColor Red }; Write-Host 'ðŸ”´ Stopping Redis...' -ForegroundColor Red; Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.ProcessName -like '*redis*'} | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host 'ðŸ—„ï¸ Stopping MinIO...' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.ProcessName -like '*minio*'} | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host 'âš¡ Stopping SvelteKit...' -ForegroundColor Blue; Get-Process | Where-Object {$_.ProcessName -like '*node*' -and $_.CommandLine -like '*vite*'} | Stop-Process -Force; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'âœ… All services stopped gracefully' -ForegroundColor Cyan
tasks.detail: Gracefully stop all Legal AI Platform services
